content:
Toiletries and household essentials are always a great way to stock up and earn points. Here are some brand and item recommendations that can help you maximize your savings and earn more points:

**High-Point Earning Brands:**

1. **Crest:** Earn 20 points per $1 spent on Crest toothpaste, toothbrushes, and mouthwash.
2. **Oral-B:** Earn 20 points per $1 spent on Oral-B toothbrushes, replacement heads, and dental care products.
3. **Pantene:** Earn 20 points per $1 spent on Pantene shampoo, conditioner, and styling products.
4. **Tide:** Earn 20 points per $1 spent on Tide laundry detergent, fabric softener, and stain removers.
5. **Febreze:** Earn 20 points per $1 spent on Febreze air fresheners, odor eliminators, and fabric refresher sprays.

**High-Value Items:**

1. **Tide Pods:** These convenient laundry detergent packets are a popular item and often have bonus point offers.
2. **Crest Whitestrips:** These teeth whitening strips are a high-value item that can earn you a lot of points.
3. **Oral-B Electric Toothbrushes:** These high-end toothbrushes are a great way to earn points and improve your oral health.
4. **Pantene Pro-V Shampoo and Conditioner:** These premium hair care products are often on sale and can earn you a lot of points.
5. **Febreze Air Effects:** These air fresheners are a popular item and can earn you points on a regular basis.

**Digital Coupon and Sale Combos:**

1. **Crest Toothpaste:** Look for digital coupons and sales on Crest toothpaste, which can be combined with the 20 points per $1 spent to maximize your savings.
2. **Tide Laundry Detergent:** Combine digital coupons and sales on Tide laundry detergent to earn points and save on your laundry needs.
3. **Pantene Shampoo and Conditioner:** Look for digital coupons and sales on Pantene shampoo and conditioner to earn points and save on your hair care needs.

**Tips:**

1. **Buy in Bulk:** Purchase items in bulk to earn more points and save on your household essentials.
2. **Stack Deals:** Combine digital coupons, sales, and points bonuses to maximize your savings.
3. **Check the Walgreens App:** Look for additional digital coupons, sales, and promotions not advertised in the weekly ad.
4. **Use Cashback Apps:** Earn cashback on your purchases through apps like Ibotta, Fetch Rewards, or Checkout 51.

By focusing on these high-point earning brands and items, you can maximize your savings and earn more points on your toiletries and household essentials. Happy shopping!
